page.title: 05FARMING..ROSSIE FARM cont.
page.content: {SOILS}:_ Light sandy soils occur on the flatter land and 'stiffer' soils on the hillsides.The latter are not so well drained. On this farm of 240 hectares, expenditure on fertilisers and chemicals mounts up. {FERTILISERS}:_ 100 tonnes of magnesium limestone at Â£11.50 per tonne. 21 tonnes 35% nitrogen; 10% phosphates ; 10% potash at Â£130 per tonne. 75 tonnes 15% nitrogen; 19% phosphates ; 19% potash at Â£152 per tonne. 21 tonnes 35% nitrogen at Â£124 per tonne. {CHEMICALS}:_ about Â£16-17000 has been spent for 1985. Other costs :_ {DIESEL}32,000 litres required. Cost Â£6080 {MACHINERY}:_ 80hp tractor Â£18,000{ { }14ft.combine harvester Â£49,000
